step-type.name: Add Node Run-List
step-type.description: Add to the run-list of a Node by adding recipes or roles in a specific order.

property-ui.label: Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of the node you wish to update.

property-ui.label: Run-List Item
property-ui.description: A comma seperate list of roles and recipes you want to add. roles are entered as 'role[ROLE_NAME]'. The full recipe format is 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME]'. Recipes can also be added with a cookbook by 'COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME'. Lastly, the default recipe can be added by 'COOKBOOK'

property-ui.label: After Item
property-ui.description: Add the run-list item after the specified item.

step-type.name: Bulk Delete Clients
step-type.description: This will delete clientss in bulk.

property-ui.label: Enter regular expression
property-ui.description: Regular expression to delete multiple cookbooks.

step-type.name: Bulk Delete Cookbooks
step-type.description: This will delete cookbooks in bulk.

property-ui.label: Enter regular expression
property-ui.description: Regular expression to delete multiple cookbooks.

property-ui.label: Purge
property-ui.description: Optional. Completly remove cookbooks from the server.

step-type.name: Bulk Delete Nodes
step-type.description: This will delete nodes in bulk.

property-ui.label: Enter regular expression
property-ui.description: Regular expression to delete multiple nodes.

step-type.name: Create Client
step-type.description: Create a client.

property-ui.label: Client name
property-ui.description: Name of the client you wish to create.

property-ui.label: Admin
property-ui.description: Check to make client admin.

step-type.name: Create Recipe
step-type.description: Create a recipe.

property-ui.label: Recipe name
property-ui.description: Name of the recipe you wish to create.

property-ui.label: Recipe path
property-ui.description: Path to the location where the recipe will be saved.

property-ui.label: Recipe contents
property-ui.description: The code that will go into the recipe.

property-ui.label: Overwrite
property-ui.description: If selected, overwrite the recipe if it exists.

step-type.name: Create Roles
step-type.description: This will create a new role. A role is a way to define certain patterns and processes that exist across nodes in an organization as belonging to a single job function.

property-ui.label: Role Name
property-ui.description: The name of the role to be created

property-ui.label: Role Description
property-ui.description: The description of the role. This value will populate the description field for the role on the server.

step-type.name: Create User
step-type.description: Create a user.

property-ui.label: User name
property-ui.description: Name of the user you wish to create.

property-ui.label: Admin
property-ui.description: Check to make user admin.

property-ui.label: Path to private key
property-ui.description: Filename in which to save the private key.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: The user password.

property-ui.label: Path to public key
property-ui.description: Used to write the public key to a file.

step-type.name: Delete Client
step-type.description: This will delete a client at a given file location.

property-ui.label: Client Name
property-ui.description: The name of the client to be deleted

step-type.name: Delete Cookbook
step-type.description: This will be used to delete one or more cookbooks.

property-ui.label: Enter cookbook name
property-ui.description: Deletes the given cookbook.

property-ui.label: Version
property-ui.description: Optional. Enter the version of the cookbook you want to delete.

property-ui.label: Delete All
property-ui.description: Optional. Delete every version of the cookbook.

property-ui.label: Purge
property-ui.description: Optional. Completely remove cookbook from the server.

step-type.name: Delete Node
step-type.description: This will be used to delete a node.

property-ui.label: Enter node name
property-ui.description: Deletes the given node.

step-type.name: Delete Recipe
step-type.description: This will delte a recipe at a given file location.

property-ui.label: Recipe File Path
property-ui.description: The file path of the recipe to be deleted

step-type.name: Delete User
step-type.description: This will delete the user specified.

property-ui.label: User Name
property-ui.description: The name of the user to be deleted

step-type.name: Install Cookbook From Site
step-type.description: This step allows the user to install a Chef cookbooks from the cookbooks community hosted at http://community.opscode.com/.

property-ui.label: Cookbook Name
property-ui.description: The name of the cookbook to be installed

property-ui.label: Cookbook Version
property-ui.description: The version of the cookbook to be installed

property-ui.label: Use Current Branch
property-ui.description: Indicates that the current branch will be used.

property-ui.label: Default Branch Name
property-ui.description: The name of the default branch. This will default to the master branch

property-ui.label: Skip Dependencies
property-ui.description: Indicates that all cookbooks to which the installed cookbook has a dependency will not be installed

property-ui.label: Cookbook Installation Path
property-ui.description: The directory in which the cookbook will be created. This can be colon separated path.

step-type.name: Remove Node Run-List
step-type.description: Remove from the run-list of a Node.

property-ui.label: Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of the node you wish to update.

property-ui.label: Run-List Item
property-ui.description: A comma seperate list of roles and recipes you want to remove. roles are entered as 'role[ROLE_NAME]'. The full recipe format is 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME]'. Recipes can also be added with a cookbook by 'COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME'. Lastly, the default recipe can be added by 'COOKBOOK'

step-type.name: Generic Knife Command
step-type.description: This step will allow you to execute any knife command onto the chef server.

property-ui.label: Enter Command
property-ui.description: Enter Knife command you wish to run. The command 'knife client list' enter 'client list'

step-type.name: Deploy chef
step-type.description: Deploy chef to a node.

property-ui.label: Enter Query
property-ui.description: Enter the query for nodes you want to deploy too.

property-ui.label: Enter SSH Login
property-ui.description: Enter the ssh login for the nodes.

property-ui.label: Enter SSH Password
property-ui.description: Enter the ssh password for the login.

property-ui.label: Enter Sudo Password
property-ui.description: Enter the password to allow for sudo on the nodes. If no password is given, the ssh password will be used instead

step-type.name: Create Cookbook
step-type.description: Create a new Cookbook on the Chef server

property-ui.label: Cookbook Name
property-ui.description: Enter the name of the Cookbook you want to create.

property-ui.label: Copyright Holder
property-ui.description: Enter the name of the copyright holder for this cookbook.

property-ui.label: Type of license
property-ui.description: Enter the type of license under which the cookbook is distributed.

property-ui.label: Email of owner
property-ui.description: Enter the email of the individual who maintains this cookbook.

property-ui.label: Cookbook Path
property-ui.description: Enter the directory where the cookbook will be created.

property-ui.label: Documentation Format
property-ui.description: Enter type of document format of the readme file.

step-type.name: Upload Cookbook
step-type.description: Upload a cookbook, role, environment, or data bag to the Chef server

property-ui.label: Path to item(s) to upload
property-ui.description: Path to the cookbook, role, environment, or databag.

property-ui.label: Number of concurrent connections allowed
property-ui.description: This is the maximum number of concurrent connections allowed. If left blank, the default is 10.

property-ui.label: Upload only new or modified files
property-ui.description: If checked, only upload new or modified files to the server.

property-ui.label: Force upload of unmodified files
property-ui.description: Check this to force of the upload of files even if they have not been modified.

property-ui.label: Do not allow modifications
property-ui.description: Indicates a cookbook cannot be modified. Any changes to this cookbook must be uploaded later as a new version.

property-ui.label: Do a dry run
property-ui.description: Indicates that no action is taken and only results are printed out.

property-ui.label: Purge files on server that are not in the Chef repo
property-ui.description: Deletes roles, cookbooks, etc. on the server that are NOT contained in the Chef repo.

property-ui.label: Disable recursive uploading of the directory
property-ui.description: Disables the recursive uploading of the directory.

property-ui.label: Local Chef-repo Layout
property-ui.description: This is the layout of the local chef repo. Possible values are: static, everything, or hosted_everything.

step-type.name: Delete a Role
step-type.description: Delete a single role.

property-ui.label: Role Name
property-ui.description: This is the name of the role which will be deleted.

step-type.name: Delete Bulk Roles
step-type.description: Delete a set of roles.

property-ui.label: Regular Expression
property-ui.description: This is the regular expression which will define which role to delete.
